directions: Place coffee, ice cream and Carnation Breakfast Essentials Drink in blender; cover. Blend until smooth.
ingredients: 1/2 cup prepared coffee, cooled to room temperature
1/4 cup Vanilla DREYER'S or EDY'S SLOW CHURNED Light Ice Cream
1 packet Rich Milk Chocolate Flavor CARNATION BREAKFAST ESSENTIALS® LIGHT START™ Complete Nutritional Drink
title: Coca Mocha Milk Shake
